tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE historical_data (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  airflow FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE HVAC_System_Sensors (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    installation_date DATE,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE HVAC_Maintenance_Logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id UUID NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_description TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE HVAC_Sensors ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, sensor_name TEXT, location TEXT, installation_date DATE, sensor_type TEXT );
CREATE TABLE HVAC_Readings ( reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sensor_id INT, reading_value FLOAT, reading_time TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES HVAC_Sensors(id) );

CREATE TABLE Maintenance_Log ( log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sensor_id INT, maintenance_date DATE, maintenance_type TEXT, maintenance_description TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES HVAC_Sensors(id) );

CREATE TABLE HVAC_Systems (
    system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    installation_date DATE,
    last_maintenance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Maintenance_Records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_id INT REFERENCES HVAC_Systems(system_id),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    technician VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Sensor_Data (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_id INT REFERENCES HVAC_Systems(system_id),
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    reading_value DECIMAL(10,2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Predictive_Maintenance (
    prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_id INT REFERENCES HVAC_Systems(system_id),
    prediction_date DATE,
    prediction_result VARCHAR(255),
    confidence_level DECIMAL(5,2)
)

CREATE TABLE Sensor_Data (
 data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 system_id UUID,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 temperature FLOAT,
 humidity FLOAT
);
